petGame

类 Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • petGame.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements this pet game.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    sly31 & mxu19

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkFood

        public static java.lang.String checkFood()
        This method constructs to check the information of the foods.
        参数:
        template - is use for show the information and detail of the foods.
        返回:
        template is return the information of the foods.

      • checkToy

        public static java.lang.String checkToy()
        This method constructs to check the information of the toys.
        参数:
        template - is use for show the information and detail of the toys.
        返回:
        template is return the information of the toys.

      • deadOrRebirth

        public static void deadOrRebirth(Players player,
                                 Pets pet)
        This method check dead Or do Rebirth. print warning message to player.
        参数:
        player - is one of the players.
        pet - is one of the pets.

      • misbehave

        public static void misbehave(Pets pet)
        This method use to check is it misbehavior. print warning message to player.
        参数:
        misCom - set by random, pets will gets misbehavior randomly. when misCom equal to "Kick", the health and fun will decreasing by that and misbehaving fixed.
        misRan - equal to 1, the fun will decreasing by that, and misbehaving fixed.
        health - display the health value of the pet. when it misbehavior, the health decreasing 10.
        fun - display the "Happy" value of the pet. when it misbehavior, the fun decreasing 10.

      • sick

        public static void sick(Players player,
                        Pets pet)
        This method use to check is pets get sick. print warning message to player.
        参数:
        RamCom - set by random, pets will get sick randomly. when misCom equal to "yes". the money decreasing 100 by running method useMoney.
        health - display the health value of the pet. when it misbehavior, the health decreasing 10.
        fun - display the "Happy" value of the pet. when it misbehavior, the fun decreasing 10.

      • shop

        public static void shop(Players player)
        This method constructs a shop for food and toy.
        参数:
        shopReader - set by random.
        buyFlag - set for check buy or not.
        shopCom - if shopCom equal to "food", then start buying food, if shopCom equal to "toy", then starting buying toy.when shopCom equal to "quit", then quit the shop

      • checkInfo

        public static void checkInfo(Pets pet)
        This method is use for check information of pets.

      • backPack

        public static void backPack(Players player)
        This method is check the backPack, backPack will include money, foods and toys, the player can see how many of them left.

      • fedPet

        public static void fedPet(Players player,
                          Pets pet)
        This method is use to feed pet. and Random events can happen when eating.
        参数:
        NameReade - is a scanner.
        foodName - is from scanner NameReade.
        random - is set a random events can happen when eating.

      • playPet

        public static void playPet(Players player,
                           Pets pet)
        This method is use to play with pet using toys.
        参数:
        NameReade - is a scanner.
        toyName - is from scanner NameReade. when toy broke, the toyName decreasing 1.

      • toiletPet

        public static void toiletPet(Players player,
                             Pets pet)
        This method is pets go to toilet.
        参数:
        ranFlag - is Random events can happen, max value of it is 10, min value is 1, when ranFlag equal 3, the pets gets misbehavior.

      • sleepPet

        public static void sleepPet(Players player,
                            Pets pet)
        This method is pets go to sleep.
        参数:
        ranFlag - is Random events can happen, max value of it is 10, min value is 1, when ranFlag equal 3, the pets gets misbehavior.

      • DisplayRank

        public static void DisplayRank()
        This method is display rank between player.
        参数:
        readerNum - is set a initial value which is 0.

      • SaveScore

        public static void SaveScore(Players winner)
        This method is save the score and find the winner.
        参数:
        winner - is the winner of the game.
        scoreReader - is a scanner.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method is to running the main game. include greeting and every step.
